text: Saint Pancras is a Catholic church covering the town centre of Ipswich, England.St Pancras, Official parish site When it was built, the church was supposed to be used as the Catholic cathedral for the East of England.St Pancras, Ipswich, suffolkchurches.co.uk, Simon Knott ==References== Category:Churches in England Category:Ipswich Category:Roman Catholic churches Category:Buildings and structures in Suffolk Category:Buildings and structures completed in the 19th century
title: St Pancras Church, Ipswich
